皵字的基本解释

皵
què
树皮粗糙坼裂：“（梧桐）树似桐而皮青不皵。”
皮肤皲裂。
与他人不和睦。

皵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《廣韻》七雀切，入藥，清。］
［《廣韻》七迹切，入昔，清。］
表皮粗糙皴裂。

皵字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页791第24
【廣韻】【正韻】七雀切【集韻】【韻會】七約切，?音鵲。皮皴也。又木皮甲錯也。【爾雅·釋木】大而皵楸，小而皵榎。【疏】樊光云：皵，豬皮也。謂樹皮粗也。【鄒浩四柏賦】皮皴皵以龍驚。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七迹切，音磧。義同。　又【廣韻】皮細起也。　又【集韻】思積切，音昔。又倉各切，音錯。義?同。　本作?。通作?。

皵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
皵字的起名意思

暂无。

皵
Basic explanation of words
皵
què
The bark is rough and cracked: "(The sycamore) The tree is like a paulownia, but the bark is green."
Cracked skin.
Disharmony with others.
皵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］
["Guangyun" Qique cut, used as medicine, clear. ]
["Guangyun" seven traces cut, into the past, Qing. ]
The epidermis is rough and cracked.
皵

[Afternoon Concentration] [Pi Zi Department] 　皵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 791-24
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Qi Que cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qi Yue cut,? Yin magpie. Pi Yan also. Mupijia is wrong again. 【Erya·Shimu】Big and 皵楸, small but 皵榎. [Sparse] Fan Guangyun: Xi, pigskin too. The bark is thick. [Zou Hao Sibai Fu] Pi Hao was shocked by the dragon.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Seven traces cut, sound moraine. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] The skin is thin.　[Jiyun] Thinking and cutting, sound Xi. They cut each place, the sound is wrong. Righteous? Same.　This work?. Pass for?.
